name: Pupp Run
description:
A game proudly made by my girlfriend and I for Butterscotch Shenanijam (6/9/2018) game jam!

This is our very first game and we learned a lot from it!

I will be expanding upon this idea and balancing everything in the near future. There will be much more polish, levels, and the score/health risk and reward system will be expanded on to make a unique arcade runner game.

Please leave some feedback so I can learn from it and create better experience for more players! Thank you!
